SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Class EntityCollection

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.EntityCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class EntityCollection extends Object implements Initializable
An EntityCollection encapsulates all behaviour related to all instances of YaegerEntity that are part of a YaegerScene. Therefore, an EntityCollection, is also responsible for creating the Game World update loop.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Instantiate an EntityCollection for a given Group and a Set of YaegerEntity instances.

    • update

      public void update(long timestamp)
      Perform all operations required during one cycle of the Game Loop, being:
      • Collect garbage All EntityCollection that have been marked as Garbage will be removed.
      • Notify Entities On all Entities that implement the interface Updatable, update() will be called.
      • Add supplied entities Entities that should be added are so-called supplied. This means that an EntitySupplier is registered with this EntityCollection. Each cycle of the Game Loop all instances of YaegerEntity that are supplied by all registered EntitySupplier are transferred to the appropriate collection.
      • Check for collisions Check if collisions have occurred between instances of Collided and Collider. In such a case, the Collided will be notified.
      • Update Statics Update the EntityCollectionStatistics.
      • Notify Statistics Observer Notify all registered StatisticsObserver.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp of the update as a long

    • initialUpdate

      public void initialUpdate()
      Perform the initial update, to ensure all available entities are transferred from their EntitySupplier to the actual collections to become part of the EntityCollection.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear this EntityCollection.

    • addDynamicEntity

      public void addDynamicEntity(Updatable dynamicEntity)
      Add a Dynamic Entity to this EntityCollection. By definition, a Dynamic Entity will implement the Updatable interface.
      Parameters:
      dynamicEntity - a Dynamic Entity, being an Entity that implements the interface Updatable

      Parameters:
      injector - the Injector used for Dependency Injection

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.
